name: Baron's Kosher 100% Pure Ground Sesame Tahini 16-ounce Jars (1 Pound (Pack of 2))
short_description: Experience Baron's Smooth Consistency Tahini: Its smooth perfection makes it easy to handle and blends well. Its well-blended consistency, less bitter, and thinner texture make it a flavorful delight to elevate your dishes effortlessly.

Stone-Ground Excellence, Silky Texture: Crafted from stone-ground seeds, our tahini promises a silky-smooth texture. Ideal for creamy hummus, delightful dips, and main courses. Trust Baron's Brand for consistent quality in taste and texture.

Nutrient-Rich Superfood: Baron's Tahini is your go-to nutritious superfood. Kosher, keto-friendly, paleo approved, and vegan – a wholesome addition full of vitamins, minerals. Perfect for baking, protein bowls, and smoothies.

Wholesome Versatile Delight: Indulge in the aromatic pure tahini paste, derived from pure sesame seeds. Its deliciously nutty flavor refines dips and sauces, pops on veggie trays, and adds an exotic touch to roasted chicken or sautéed fish dishes.

BPA-Free Convenient Packaging: Trust Baron's Brand with our 16-oz. jars, crafted from BPA-free PET material. Snap-on lids secure freshness. Choose sustainable, recyclable packaging that complements the premium quality and appearance of our tahini.

name: Soom Foods Organic Tahini 11oz (1 Pack) | Roasted & Ground Sesame Seed Paste | Creamy Tahini for Dubai Chocolate, Hummus, Sauces | Vegan, Nut-Free, Gluten-Free, Kosher, Keto, Paleo, Whole30
short_description: DEEP, NUTTY FLAVOR IN EVERY SPOONFUL: Made from 100% premium sesame seeds, nothing else! This rich, creamy tahini paste brings authentic flavor to hummus, sauces, dressings, baked goods, and chocolate desserts.
EFFORTLESSLY SMOOTH & EASY TO MIX: Soom tahini’s silky-smooth texture drizzles, blends, and bakes seamlessly - no clumps or separation - making every recipe creamy and craveable.
CHEF-TRUSTED QUALITY: Soom tahini is preferred by award-winning chefs and restaurants nationwide for its authentic nutty flavor, creamy texture, and easy-to-mix consistency.

PLANT-BASED PROTEIN & MINERALS: Each serving delivers 6g of plant protein plus iron & calcium—making Soom tahini a nourishing, nut-free vegan protein spread and nut butter alternative for toast, smoothies, and sauces.
ALLERGY-FRIENDLY & CLEAN-LABEL: Naturally nut-free, gluten-free, dairy-free, vegan, keto & paleo-friendly. Certified kosher with no artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We stand by every jar of tahini. If anything’s not right with your order, contact us and we’ll make it right.

name: Organic Tahini Paste 16 oz (1lb) - Smooth Tahini Organic from Hulled Sesame Seeds - USDA Certified, Kosher, Gluten Free - Creamy Tahini Sauce & Sesame Paste for Cooking - The Holly Tree
short_description: SMOOTH ORGANIC TAHINI FROM HULLED SESAME SEEDS – Crafted using premium hulled sesame seeds, this organic tahini offers a silky, mild flavor and smooth texture ideal for spreads, dips, and sauces.
CLEAN & CREAMY SESAME PASTE – Our tahini paste is ground from organic sesame seeds and contains no preservatives, salt, or oils - just pure, plant-based sesame paste ready for culinary creativity.

WHAT ARE HULLED SESAME SEEDS? – Hulled sesame seeds have had their outer shell (hull) removed, resulting in a lighter color, smoother texture, and milder flavor compared to unhulled sesame seeds, which retain the outer husk and offer a nuttier, more fibrous tahini. Tahini made with hulled seeds is creamier and subtler, while unhulled tahini has a coarser texture and a stronger, earthier taste.
VERSATILE TAHINI SAUCE FOR EVERY RECIPE – Use it in traditional Mediterranean dishes, as a creamy sesame sauce for noodles or grain bowls, or in sweet pairings like tahini for Dubai chocolate.

USDA ORGANIC, GLUTEN FREE & KOSHER – The Holly Tree’s tahini organic is USDA certified, kosher, and gluten free. It’s made using hulled white sesame seeds toasted that are gently toasted to retain flavor and aroma.

TAHINI DRESSING ESSENTIAL – Add depth to your salads and wraps with a quick and nutritious tahini dressing. This smooth sesame dressing complements a wide range of cuisines from Middle Eastern to modern fusion.

PURELY GROUND HULLED SESAME FOR DAILY USE – Our tahini is a creamy staple made from high-quality sesame seeds organic, perfect for spreading, blending, and baking. Try our Unhulled or Black Tahini for more variety.

TAHINI ORGÁNICO CON SEMILLAS DE AJONJOLÍ PELADAS – Esta pasta de ajonjolí blanco tiene una textura suave y sabor delicado, ideal para salsas, aderezos, postres o como alternativa nutritiva para untar.
product_description: The Holly Tree Organic Tahini (Hulled Sesame Seeds) offers a mild, creamy twist on a classic pantry essential. Made from gently toasted hulled sesame seeds, this tahini paste delivers a smooth texture with a clean finish, perfect for everyday cooking, baking, and snacking. Our organic tahini is crafted without preservatives, salt, or oils - just pure organic sesame seeds ground into a rich, versatile sesame paste. Whether you're making a velvety tahini dressing, a quick dip, or experimenting with tahini for Dubai chocolate, it’s a go-to base ingredient for countless recipes. USDA Organic, kosher, and gluten free, this tahini sauce is a wholesome choice for kitchens looking to elevate plant-based meals. Prefer something nuttier or more robust? Try our Unhulled Tahini for added fiber or our deep, flavorful Black Tahini—all part of The Holly Tree's trio of sesame goodness.
